answerText: A Dream Play[10] This Swedish author of A Dream Play also wrote about the valet Jean who gives a razor to the title character of another play, Miss Julie.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | Editors Packet 1 | 13 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The main character of this play learns about the misfortunes of mankind and, despite being a goddess, marries a human lawyer. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which Agnes, the daughter of Indra, descends to Earth and returns to heaven at the end.
